name: job-types
title: Job Types
description: Metrics for jobs and executions grouped by job type.

groups.name: overview
groups.title: Overview
groups.description: Overall counts based on job status.

groups.name: queue_time
groups.title: Queue Time
groups.description: When jobs were in the queue.

groups.name: job_time
groups.title: Job Task Time
groups.description: When jobs were executing their actual goal.

groups.name: post_time
groups.title: Post-task Time
groups.description: When jobs were being cleaned up.

groups.name: run_time
groups.title: Run Time
groups.description: When related tasks were run (pre, job, post).

groups.name: stage_time
groups.title: Stage Time
groups.description: Times related to the overhead of the system.

columns.name: completed_count
columns.title: Completed Count
columns.description: Number of successfully completed jobs.

columns.name: error_system_count
columns.title: Error System Count
columns.description: Number of system errors.

columns.name: error_data_count
columns.title: Error Data Count
columns.description: Number of data errors.

columns.name: error_algorithm_count
columns.title: Error Algorithm Count
columns.description: Number of algorithm errors.

columns.name: failed_count
columns.title: Failed Count
columns.description: Number of incomplete failed jobs.

columns.name: canceled_count
columns.title: Canceled Count
columns.description: Number of incomplete canceled jobs.

columns.name: total_count
columns.title: Total Count
columns.description: Number of completed, failed, and canceled jobs.

columns.name: queue_time_sum
columns.title: Queue Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total time the job waited in the queue.

columns.name: queue_time_min
columns.title: Queue Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum time the job waited in the queue.

columns.name: queue_time_max
columns.title: Queue Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum time the job waited in the queue.

columns.name: queue_time_avg
columns.title: Queue Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average time the job waited in the queue.

columns.name: pre_time_sum
columns.title: Pre-task Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total time spent preparing the job task.

columns.name: pre_time_min
columns.title: Pre-task Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum time spent preparing the job task.

columns.name: pre_time_max
columns.title: Pre-task Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum time spent preparing the job task.

columns.name: pre_time_avg
columns.title: Pre-task Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average time spent preparing the job task.

columns.name: job_time_sum
columns.title: Job Task Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total time spent running the job task.

columns.name: job_time_min
columns.title: Job Task Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum time spent running the job task.

columns.name: job_time_max
columns.title: Job Task Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum time spent running the job task.

columns.name: job_time_avg
columns.title: Job Task Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average time spent running the job task.

columns.name: post_time_sum
columns.title: Post-task Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total time spent finalizing the job task.

columns.name: post_time_min
columns.title: Post-task Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum time spent finalizing the job task.

columns.name: post_time_max
columns.title: Post-task Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum time spent finalizing the job task.

columns.name: post_time_avg
columns.title: Post-task Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average time spent finalizing the job task.

columns.name: run_time_sum
columns.title: Run Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total time spent running the pre, job, and post tasks.

columns.name: run_time_min
columns.title: Run Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum time spent running the pre, job, and post tasks.

columns.name: run_time_max
columns.title: Run Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum time spent running the pre, job, and post tasks.

columns.name: run_time_avg
columns.title: Run Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average time spent running the pre, job, and post tasks.

columns.name: stage_time_sum
columns.title: Stage Time (Sum)
columns.description: Total overhead time spent managing tasks.

columns.name: stage_time_min
columns.title: Stage Time (Min)
columns.description: Minimum overhead time spent managing tasks.

columns.name: stage_time_max
columns.title: Stage Time (Max)
columns.description: Maximum overhead time spent managing tasks.

columns.name: stage_time_avg
columns.title: Stage Time (Avg)
columns.description: Average overhead time spent managing tasks.

choices.name: landsat8-parse
choices.title: Landsat 8 Parse
choices.description: Parses Landsat 8 multi-tif files in tar.gz archives

choices.name: sam
choices.title: Spectral Angle Mapper
choices.description: The algorithm determines the spectral similarity between two spectra by calculating the angle between the spectra.

choices.name: scm
choices.title: Spectral Correlation Mapper
choices.description: An improvement on the Spectral Angle Mapper for evaluating spectra similarity.

choices.name: cem
choices.title: Constrained Energy Minimization
choices.description: CEM is used for target detection in hyperspectral remote sensing imagery.

choices.name: wv2-atmosphere-corr
choices.title: WorldView-2 Atmospheric Correction
choices.description: Applies Atmospheric Correction to WorldView-2 GeoTiffs

choices.name: landsat8-atmos-corr
choices.title: Landsat 8 Atmospheric Correction
choices.description: Applies Atmospheric Correction to Landsat 8 GeoTiffs

choices.name: caffe-aircraft-detection
choices.title: Caffe Aircraft Detection
choices.description: Caffe is a deep learning framework made with expression, speed, and modularity in mind. It is developed by the Berkeley Vision and Learning Center (BVLC) and by community contributors. Yangqing Jia created the project during his PhD at UC Berkeley.
